'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an {{lc:Amulet}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}This necklace is an eclectic collection of detritus, trinkets, and oddments that caught the eye of its broodmother owner. These glittering prizes act as a banner and beacon to less Lagufaeth, inspiring them to unlikely bravery. Though there is likely no magic in this humble device, it does seem to resonate with the broodmother's avarice and dominance.}}

== Description ==
{{Description |{{#var:description}}This necklace is an eclectic collection of detritus, trinkets, and oddments that caught the eye of its broodmother owner. These glittering prizes act as a banner and beacon to less Lagufaeth, inspiring them to unlikely bravery. Though there is likely no magic in this humble device, it does seem to resonate with the broodmother's avarice and dominance.}}
